attributes.action: Create a breastfeeding bill similar to the breastfeeding etc. (scotland) Act 2005
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Breastfeeding is the most natural method of feeding a child. Many breastfeeding mothers feel uncomfortable to breastfeed their child in public. We urge the government to introduce a bill in this country which prevents criticisim of breastfeeding in public, to encourage more people to feed their child naturally, And to actively promote this bill.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Create a breastfeeding bill similar to the breastfeeding etc. (scotland) Act 2005"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15731.asp

Prime Minister's Office
